about.AboutShort: who loves to offer a good solution by interpreting business needs to create experiences that attract and persuade the end customer
about.AboutLong:
I have 12 years of experience in web development, specializing in e-commerce.
I have a strong background in programming, responsive design, and accessibility. I am a proactive, detail-oriented, and creative professional who enjoys working in a team and learning continuously. I have a passion for problem-solving and a strong commitment to delivering high-quality work. I am looking for a challenging position where I can contribute my skills and experience to help a company grow and succeed.

skills.2: Responsive Design: CSS, SASS, Semantic HTML

bullets.1: Migrated a WordPress webpage to a robust Shopify e-commerce platform, meticulously categorizing over 2500 products into SEO-friendly automatic collections, which increased sales by 30%.
bullets.2: Programmed a system to generate custom reports using React, connected to the Shopify API via REST API and reading info from a SQL database.

bullets.1: Developed custom landing pages and mailings using CSS, JS, HTML, JSON, MongoDB, Liquid, and React.
bullets.2: Increased sales by 130% by migrating from OpenCart to Shopify.

bullets.1: Optimized client web performance using Pixel Perfect development (HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, MySQL) and programmed successful email marketing campaigns.
bullets.2: Created custom WordPress themes from scratch, adapting design and features for each client.

bullets.1: Developed a custom Shopify app that automatically generates a list of best-selling products, which decreased analysis time by 20%.
bullets.2: Connected to the Shopify API via REST API.
